caption: Relating to the applicability of sex offender registration requirements to certain felonies based on the offense initially charged in the case.
summary: This bill amends the Texas Code of Criminal Procedure regarding sex offender registration requirements. It does not specifically target Chinese immigrants or any particular nationality. The bill adds a new category of reportable convictions and specifies registration requirements based on initial filed charges. This legislation applies equally to all individuals regardless of national origin.
translation: 该法案修改了德克萨斯州刑事诉讼法中关于性犯罪者登记要求的条款。该法案并未特别针对中国移民或任何特定国籍的人群。法案增加了一个新的需要报告的定罪类别，并根据最初提起的指控规定了登记要求。该立法平等适用于所有人，不论其国籍。
committees:
